simulator.elevatormodules

Class CarWeightSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.payloads.Networkable
      • simulator.elevatormodules.Module
        • simulator.elevatormodules.PassengerModule
          • simulator.elevatormodules.CarWeightSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    simulator.elevatormodules.passengers.PassengerEventSender, TimeSensitive

    public class CarWeightSensor
extends PassengerModule
implements TimeSensitive
    Controls the weight alarm inside the car. If the total weight of all passengers in the car exceeds Elevator.MaxCarCapacity, this sensor will activate the alarm. Provides a passenger interface, and an interface for PassngerHandler to create set the current weight of the car. Also reports the weight via network message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CarWeightSensor

        public CarWeightSensor(SimTime period,
               boolean verbose)
        Constructs a new CarWeightSensor that sends messages every period microseconds.
        Parameters:
        period - The time between CarWeightPayload and CarWeightAlarmPayload messages.
        verbose - Whether to generate log messages about passenger weights and the state of the alarm when #receive(CarWeightPayload) is called.
